column4: hello i was wondering since i have asked this question about 20 times ... why is it i can connect to wireless networks that are WEP with a passphrase, but no other networks ?????
i just put WEP on it because other wise i can not connect
so why is it my father's windows laptop can connect to every network in anyway but i can only connect to a WEP with a passphrase ?
can you reflash it with openwrt check http://toh.openwrt.org
why would have i have to flash the AP ??
Run linux on it makes stuff easier to debug works better generally (if it is supported)
If your router is in it it can be reflashed
Run linux on it so you can use iptables instead of whatever junk is currently on there
that makes no sense towards my question ... there is no problem with the AP i am connected to it right now
Don't know I don't use any of that stuff
